CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 23, 1962, pg. 28 reads:" "Peaks" Winners - At the recent Peaks of Progress breakfast at Kaufmann's Department Store, Dr. Calvin E. Gross, superintendent of Pittsburgh schools, is shown congratulating (left to right) Carol Peak, Westinghouse; John Robinson, Fifth Avenue High, and Gary Earl Hillyar, three of the six winners in city schools. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. Calvin E. Gross, superintendent of Pittsburgh schools,congratulating, from left: Carol Peak, John Robinson, and Gary Earl Hillyar, standing in Kaufmann's Department Store during Peaks of Progress breakfast
